evidence.source_document: Order Granting in Part Motions to Dismiss
evidence.text: ORDERED AND ADJUDGED that the Motions, [ECF Nos. 50–51], are GRANTED IN PART and DENIED IN PART as set forth herein.
Magistrate Judge Jared M. Strauss on 8/30/2022.

extracted.value: Defendants' motions to dismiss (Ramos Motion and Non-Ramos Motion) were granted in part and denied in part.

evidence.source_document: Final Judgment as to Individual Defendants
evidence.text: ORDERED AND ADJUDGED that Final Judgment is entered against Plaintiff, Latoya Ratlieff, and in favor of individual Defendants Eliezer Ramos, Paul Cristafaro, Steve Greenlaw, Avery Figueras, Robert Dietrich, Douglas MacDoughall, Rick Maglione, and John Does 1–3.

evidence.source_document: Final Judgment as to Individual Defendants
evidence.text: Done and ordered in Miami, Florida, this 4th day of September, 2024.

extracted.value: Final Judgment entered against Plaintiff, Latoya Ratlieff, and in favor of individual Defendants Eliezer Ramos, Paul Cristafaro, Steve Greenlaw, Avery Figueras, Robert Dietrich, Douglas MacDoughall, Rick Maglione, and John Does 1–3, ordered and adjudged on September 4, 2024.
